files.patch:
@@ -172,2 +172,2 @@
-  ifeq ($(call isCompiler, gcc), true)
-    JVM_CFLAGS_FEATURES += -flto=auto -fuse-linker-plugin -fno-strict-aliasing \
+  ifeq ($(TOOLCHAIN_TYPE), gcc)
+    JVM_CFLAGS_FEATURES += -flto=$(JOBS) -fuse-linker-plugin -fno-strict-aliasing \
@@ -175,3 +175,3 @@
-    JVM_LDFLAGS_FEATURES += $(CXX_O_FLAG_HIGHEST_JVM) -flto=auto \
-        -fuse-linker-plugin -fno-strict-aliasing
-  else ifeq ($(call isCompiler, clang), true)
+    JVM_LDFLAGS_FEATURES += $(CXX_O_FLAG_HIGHEST_JVM) -flto=$(JOBS) \
+        -fuse-linker-plugin -fno-strict-aliasing -fno-omit-frame-pointer -Wno-attribute-warning
+  else ifeq ($(TOOLCHAIN_TYPE), clang)
@@ -179,1 +179,1 @@
-    ifeq ($(call isBuildOs, aix), true)
+    ifeq ($(call isTargetOs, aix), true)
@@ -183,2 +183,2 @@
-  else ifeq ($(call isCompiler, microsoft), true)
-    JVM_CFLAGS_FEATURES += -GL
+  else ifeq ($(TOOLCHAIN_TYPE), microsoft)
+    JVM_CFLAGS_FEATURES += -GL -Gy

@@ -25,3 +25,0 @@
-// Stopgap fix until FORBID_C_FUNCTION can work properly with LTO
-#define DISABLE_POISONING_STOPGAP
-
